channel.title: Cleaning Up on Save The World
channel.description: Recent content in Cleaning Up on Save The World

item.title: Hakomi Principles
item.description: Non violence Mindfulness Mind/Body Truth Change Organicity Unity Loving Presence Hakomi therapists are working to save the world. But here I am going to focus mainly on its principles. These principles are a foundation we can build on. They can be our North star to help guide us when we get lost. These principles work together. All of them are necessary. If a Hakomi session didn’t go well, students are taught to look to the principles to see what was missing.
